gcci.text: At $3.18/hr for H100s, supply has normalized enough to ease capex pressure and shift focus to power, memory bandwidth, and lead-time risk.

gtpi.text: At $1.25 per million tokens for inputs, aggressive API pricing is compressing margins and rewarding small, efficient models that drive higher tokens/dollar.

gagl.text: AI's ~120 TWh annual load is stressing grids, accelerating interest in nuclear and dispatchable builds, while tightening corporate carbon accounting.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment is buoyant but pivoting toward capital discipline and sustainable unit economics as capex and energy intensity rise.
